languages.text: "Что касается тех, кто находится на вершине культа... нам так и не удалось выйти на след всех предводителей. Я предполагаю, часть из них скрывается в глубинах {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}, а те, что руководят фанатиками на ближних мирах, хорошо прячутся... или пользуются высоким покровительством".

traits.locale_text: "Что касается тех, кто находится на вершине Культа... нам так и не удалось выследить всех предводителей Культа. Я предполагаю, часть из них скрывается в глубинах Коронуса, а те, что руководят фанатиками на ближних мирах, хорошо скрываются... или пользуются высоким покровительством".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "As for those at the top of the cult's hierarchy... we have not yet managed to get a lead on all of the cult's leaders. I imagine that some of them are hiding in the depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, but those who are orchestrating the fanatics on nearby worlds are hiding very well indeed... or receiving protection from above."
languages.original_text: "Что касается тех, кто находится на вершине культа... нам так и не удалось выйти на след всех предводителей. Я предполагаю, часть из них скрывается в глубинах {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}, а те, что руководят фанатиками на ближних мирах, хорошо прячутся... или пользуются высоким покровительством".

traits.locale_text: "As for those at the top of the cult's hierarchy... we have not yet managed to get a lead on all of the cult's leaders. I imagine that some of them are hiding in the depths of the Koronus Expanse, but those who are orchestrating the fanatics on nearby worlds are hiding very well indeed... or receiving protection from above."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As for those at the top of the cult's hierarchy... we have not yet managed to get a lead on all of the cult's leaders. I imagine that some of them are hiding in the depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, but those who are orchestrating the fanatics on nearby worlds are hiding very well indeed... or receiving protection from above."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As for those at the top of the cult's hierarchy... we have not yet managed to get a lead on all of the cult's leaders. I imagine that some of them are hiding in the depths of the Koronus Expanse, but those who are orchestrating the fanatics on nearby worlds are hiding very well indeed... or receiving protection from above."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As for those at the top of the cult's hierarchy... we have not yet managed to get a lead on all of the cult's leaders. I imagine that some of them are hiding in the depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, but those who are orchestrating the fanatics on nearby worlds are hiding very well indeed... or receiving protection from above."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “至于邪教的高层人物……我们目前尚未掌握所有领袖的线索。我猜想，他们之中一部分人应该是躲在了{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}深处。除了他们之外，那些在附近的世界中策划狂热行动的人，他们确实躲藏得很好……也有可能是上面的人提供了保护伞。”
languages.original_text: "As for those at the top of the cult's hierarchy... we have not yet managed to get a lead on all of the cult's leaders. I imagine that some of them are hiding in the depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, but those who are orchestrating the fanatics on nearby worlds are hiding very well indeed... or receiving protection from above."

traits.locale_text: “至于邪教的高层人物……我们目前尚未掌握所有领袖的线索。我猜想，他们之中一部分人应该是躲在了{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}深处。除了他们之外，那些在附近的世界中策划狂热行动的人，他们确实躲藏得很好……也有可能是上面的人提供了保护伞。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "As for those at the top of the cult's hierarchy... we have not yet managed to get a lead on all of the cult's leaders. I imagine that some of them are hiding in the depths of the Koronus Expanse, but those who are orchestrating the fanatics on nearby worlds are hiding very well indeed... or receiving protection from above."

languages.text: «En cuanto a la cúpula jerárquica del culto... aún no hemos conseguido identificar a todos sus líderes. Imagino que algunos están ocultos en las profundidades de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, pero los que organizan a los fanáticos en los mundos cercanos se esconden muy bien... o reciben ayuda de arriba».
languages.original_text: "As for those at the top of the cult's hierarchy... we have not yet managed to get a lead on all of the cult's leaders. I imagine that some of them are hiding in the depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, but those who are orchestrating the fanatics on nearby worlds are hiding very well indeed... or receiving protection from above."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto a la cúpula jerárquica del culto... aún no hemos conseguido identificar a todos sus líderes. Imagino que algunos están ocultos en las profundidades de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, pero los que organizan a los fanáticos en los mundos cercanos se esconden muy bien... o reciben ayuda de arriba».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「教団のヒエラルキーのトップにいる者たちについては…我々はまだその全容を把握できていない。彼らの何人かは{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の奥深くに隠れていると思われる。だが、近隣の惑星で狂信者たちを指揮している者たちは、実に巧妙に身を隠している…あるいは、上からの保護を受けているようだ」
languages.original_text: "As for those at the top of the cult's hierarchy... we have not yet managed to get a lead on all of the cult's leaders. I imagine that some of them are hiding in the depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, but those who are orchestrating the fanatics on nearby worlds are hiding very well indeed... or receiving protection from above."

traits.locale_text: 「教団のヒエラルキーのトップにいる者たちについては…我々はまだその全容を把握できていない。彼らの何人かは{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の奥深くに隠れていると思われる。だが、近隣の惑星で狂信者たちを指揮している者たちは、実に巧妙に身を隠している…あるいは、上からの保護を受けているようだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Und was die Wenigen an der Spitze der Hierarchie anbelangt ... Wir haben bisher noch nicht alle Anführer des Kults identifiziert. Ich vermute, dass einige sich in den Tiefen der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} versteckt halten. Doch jene, die die Fanatiker auf nahegelegenen Welten befehligen, verstecken sich wirklich ganz ausgezeichnet ... oder sie erhalten Schutz von oben."
languages.original_text: "As for those at the top of the cult's hierarchy... we have not yet managed to get a lead on all of the cult's leaders. I imagine that some of them are hiding in the depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, but those who are orchestrating the fanatics on nearby worlds are hiding very well indeed... or receiving protection from above."

traits.locale_text: "Und was die Wenigen an der Spitze der Hierarchie anbelangt ... Wir haben bisher noch nicht alle Anführer des Kults identifiziert. Ich vermute, dass einige sich in den Tiefen der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} versteckt halten. Doch jene, die die Fanatiker auf nahegelegenen Welten befehligen, verstecken sich wirklich ganz ausgezeichnet ... oder sie erhalten Schutz von oben."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Quant au sommet de la hiérarchie... nous n'avons à ce jour toujours pas réussi à identifier leurs leaders. J'imagine que certains d'entre eux se terrent au fin fond des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, mais ceux qui dirigent les fanatiques des mondes voisins sont très bien cachés... ou bénéficient de la protection d'individus haut placés. »
languages.original_text: "As for those at the top of the cult's hierarchy... we have not yet managed to get a lead on all of the cult's leaders. I imagine that some of them are hiding in the depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, but those who are orchestrating the fanatics on nearby worlds are hiding very well indeed... or receiving protection from above."

traits.locale_text: « Quant au sommet de la hiérarchie... nous n'avons à ce jour toujours pas réussi à identifier leurs leaders. J'imagine que certains d'entre eux se terrent au fin fond des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, mais ceux qui dirigent les fanatiques des mondes voisins sont très bien cachés... ou bénéficient de la protection d'individus haut placés. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Tarikatın başındakilere gelirsek... Tüm önderlerini saptayabilmiş değiliz. Bir kısmının {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nde{/g} bir yerlerde gizlendiğini düşünüyorum. Civar dünyalardaki fanatikleri idare edenler ya saklanmasını çok iyi biliyor... Ya da yukarıdan birilerince korunuyor."
languages.original_text: "As for those at the top of the cult's hierarchy... we have not yet managed to get a lead on all of the cult's leaders. I imagine that some of them are hiding in the depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, but those who are orchestrating the fanatics on nearby worlds are hiding very well indeed... or receiving protection from above."

traits.locale_text: "Tarikatın başındakilere gelirsek... Tüm önderlerini saptayabilmiş değiliz. Bir kısmının {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nde bir yerlerde gizlendiğini düşünüyorum. Civar dünyalardaki fanatikleri idare edenler ya saklanmasını çok iyi biliyor... Ya da yukarıdan birilerince koruyor."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
